errors.email_already_exists: Email is already registered on Wikia
errors.registration_error: We cannot complete your registration at this time
errors.username_unavailable: Username is taken or has invalid characters. Username can contain letters and numbers from one alphabet and must include one letter
errors.username_ip_address: Username must include at least one letter
errors.username_illegal_characters: Username can contain only letters and numbers from one alphabet and must include one letter
errors.user_already_linked: This Wikia account is already connected to Facebook
errors.fb_account_already_linked: This Facebook account is already connected to another Wikia user account
errors.wrong-credentials: We don't recognize these credentials. Try again or register a new account.
errors.server-error: There was an error processing your request. Please try again later.
